title: 2007 Anime Logo (alt-1)
content:
Not sure how to break this apart for font recognition sites.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140803101249im_/http:/typophile.com/files/3_4991.jpg)

 Tangier Black 

Solved By:

author: akovia

comments.content: I have never had luck with that before with script fonts, especially at whatthefont. I guess it was my break points or luck of the draw. I will use due diligence next time before posting. Thank you for the find!

script fonts are harder. and sometimes with things like this sample you have to guess at removing the outline or not. my first try included the width of the outline. second time i removed it. as for breaking the connections, i usually leave the tails to the right, and cut clean on the left of the glyph. like it would be if you typed it alone. sometimes you can see where the connection is and break it there.
